SEARCH
Package Service

Class FileBookRepository

java.lang.Object
Service.FileBookRepository
public class FileBookRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing Books stored in a file. Provides methods to save, update, query, and manage availability of books.

      Saves a book to the file and adds its copies to the media copy repository.
      Parameters:

      numberOfCopies - number of copies to add

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the book if found, otherwise null
